general_faqs.answer: Our official start time is 9 AM. Please check the #announcements channel for any daily variations.
Standard lunch breaks are [#] minutes. Your direct supervisor will coordinate specific timings.

call_codes.not interested: Code as 'Not in'. Be polite and thank them for their time.
call_codes.callback scheduled: Code as 'CB'. Confirm the date and time with the customer. Log it in the CRM and set a reminder for yourself.
call_codes.wrong number: Code as 'WN'. Verify if it's a consistent issue with the data list.

fallback_message: I'm sorry, I don't have an answer for that right now. Please DM Adam for assistance. You can also ask them to teach me this for next time!
